attributes.action: permanently relocate parliament away from london, thus making it less necessary for M.P's to have second homes in london.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Parliament was relocated away from London, to the Midlands or any of the large cities in the north of England, it would have many beneficial effects on Democracy in this country, not least of which would be the need for politicians to have expensive second homes in London,(subsidized by us, the taxpayer!).

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
